text: Zala Meršnik (born 7 June 2001) is a Slovenian footballer who plays as a goalkeeper and has appeared for the Slovenia women's national team. ==Career== Meršnik has been capped for the Slovenia national team, appearing for the team during the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup qualifying cycle. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Slovenian women's footballers Category:Slovenian expatriate sportspeople in Germany Category:Expatriate sportspeople in Germany Category:Slovenia women's international footballers Category:Women's association football goalkeepers Category:1. FFC Turbine Potsdam players Category:ŽNK Pomurje players
title: Zala Meršnik
